response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which holds significant value for us at $1,500,000. Given its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. Considering its worth to you, we are offering it at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a rare opportunity to acquire such a valuable asset at a competitive rate. We look forward to your positive response and the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
